options.title: -a
options.description: display all locations containing an executable named NAME; includes aliases, builtins, and functions, if and only if the `-p' option is not also used

options.title: -P
options.description: force a PATH search for each NAME, even if it is an alias, builtin, or function, and returns the name of the disk file that would be executed

options.title: -p
options.description: returns either the name of the disk file that would be executed, or nothing if `type -t NAME' would not return `file'

options.title: -t
options.description: output a single word which is one of `alias', `keyword', `function', `builtin', `file' or `', if NAME is an alias, shell reserved word, shell function, shell builtin, disk file, or not found, respectively
